title: Disclaimer
subtitle: Important notes about this project.
plainText: This project was created for educational and entertaining purposes to showcase specific Flutter concepts.
It demonstrates approaches to code structure, widget usage, and performance tweaks for no-gesture environments.
The code does not necessarily reflect production-quality standards and may contain inconsistencies for demonstrative purposes.
• Hardcoded values are used for clarity.
• The primary focus is on UX, not UI polish.
